participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and sociable, enjoys engaging in conversations about interests and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job. I like to play basketball. I have went to mexico 4 times this year. I like lizards. I like to go on walks.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, spends a lot of time thinking and practicing music.
participant_2.background: My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others. I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids. I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene. I wait for something interesting to happen each day. My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: I am doing well today, thank you for asking!
What's your favorite thing to do?
I would say playing guitar is my favorite thing to do.
That's awesome! I have actually never played the guitar before.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I've always been interested in it, but I never had the time to learn.
Well, if you ever decide to pick it up, I'm always here to help you out!
Thanks I appreciate that! I'm sure I'll take you up on that offer soon enough.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
I love rock and roll too! Some of my favorite bands are the Beatles, Guns N' Roses, and AC/DC.
Those are all great bands! I'm also a big fan of Led Zeppelin and Pink Floyd.
Those are two of my favorite bands as well! It's nice to meet someone who shares my musical taste.
Me too! I'm always looking for people to talk music with.
Well, I'm definitely up for talking music anytime!
